level.text: The purpose of this chapter is to establish the standards and procedures under which a AFDC and AFDC-related recipients are enrolled in and disenrolled from the District of Columbia’s Medicaid Managed Care program.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is D.C. Code, 2001 Ed. * 1-307.02; and Mayor’s Order 93-218.
